actions.description: 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage plus 2 (1d4) necrotic damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: The dragon exhales yellowish necrotic energy in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 11 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 21 (6d6) necrotic damage and is weakened until the end of its next turn. A weakened creature has disadvantage on Strength-based ability checks and Strength saving throws, and the creature's weapon attacks that rely on Strength deal half damage. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't weakened.
actions.name: Desiccating Breath (Recharge 5-6)

actions.description:
The dragon casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 12):
1/day each: bane
actions.name: Spellcasting (Psionics)

specialTraits.description: The dragon can breathe both air and water.
specialTraits.name: Amphibious
